titleSection.name: VersionOne SDK NET APIClient
titleSection.shortDescription: a library for custom .NET development against the VersionOne Platform's REST-based API

descriptionSection.description: The APIClient provides access to the Core API without concern for the underlying RESTful API or the HTTP/XML plumbing. Through the APIClient, developers can query for simple or complex sets of information, update the information, and execute system-defined operations. The APIClient is best suited for course-grained and bulk access.

qualityBands.name: seed
qualityBands.shortDesc: The initial idea of a product. May not be stable code.

qualityBands.name: sapling
qualityBands.shortDesc: The product is undergoing rapid growth. The code works but expect major changes.

qualityBands.name: mature
qualityBands.shortDesc: The product is stable. The code will continue to evolve with minimum breaking changes.
